headline.kicker: AT LUNCH WITH: Dr. Robert C. Atkins
headline.main: Refighting The Battle Of the Bulge

docs.abstract: Interview with Dr Robert C Atkins on his new book, Dr Atkins' New Diet Revolution; he warns there is obesity epidemic in United States; photo (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: FOR lunch, Dr. Robert C. Atkins orders a bibb salad with Gorgonzola and a veal paillard. His marketing director, Nancy Hancock, orders the trout wrapped in a potato crust. Really? In front of the doctor who created the high-protein, low-carbohydrate diet, a loyal staff member consorting with dreaded carbohydrates? Quelle horreur! ''I just take off the crust,'' she says calmly. Dr. Atkins looks surprised. ''I've always been afraid of the potatoes, or I would have ordered it, too,'' he says.

headline.main: Lowe Direct settles a dispute with five former top executives who left to open a breakaway agency.

docs.abstract: Out-of-court settlement is reached in contentious legal dispute between Lowe Direct, direct-marketing division of Lowe & Partners/SMS in New York, and five former top executives of Lowe Direct who left unexpectedly to open their own breakaway shop; settlement comes three weeks after Lowe Direct filed suit against executives, who opened breakaway agency---named Lieber, Levett, Koenig, Farese & Babcock--in New York on Oct 17 (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: AN out-of-court settlement was reached yesterday in a contentious legal dispute between Lowe Direct, the direct-marketing division of Lowe & Partners/SMS in New York, and five former top executives of Lowe Direct who left unexpectedly last month to open their own breakaway shop. The settlement came three weeks after Lowe Direct filed suit in New York State Supreme Court against the executives, who opened the breakaway agency -- named Lieber, Levett, Koenig, Farese & Babcock -- in New York on Oct. 17.
